definition: hard to solve/hard to dispel/hard to understand/hard to undo
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
hard to untie, hard to separate (idiom); inextricably involved/locked in battle
to become caught up in an irresolvable situation (idiom)
to remove perils and solve disputes (idiom); to reconcile differences
enigmatic knot hard to untie (idiom); thorny problem/intractable difficulty

sentences.english: Contains settings to manage Remote Procedure Call troubleshooting .
sentences.chinese: 包含管理遠程過程調用疑難解答的設置。

sentences.english: What are the qualities that makes one API easy to use and other hard?
sentences.chinese: 是哪種品質會讓一套API易用而另一套複雜難解？

sentences.english: Courage is a hard thing to figure.
sentences.chinese: 勇氣是件很難解釋清的事。

sentences.english: Sensitivity and rationality, just like life and death, are complicated issues in life.
sentences.chinese: 感性與理性就如同生與死是人生一道難解的命題。

sentences.english: Fighting fire with fire without reconciliation and healing will never solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 以火攻火，不能和解和癒合，絕難解決問題。

sentences.english: The knot which you thought a Gordian one will untie it before you.
sentences.chinese: 你認爲很難解開的那個結，有人比你更早解開呢。

sentences.english: They are locked together in a fierce quarrel over a trivial matter.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲了一點小事而吵得難分難解。

sentences.english: The two opposing armies are locked in battle.
Answer:Check the system clock on the users computer.
sentences.chinese: 你正在對一個用戶的漫遊配置文件進行疑難解答。

sentences.english: Old Mrs. Yu woke up. She was confused by this weird dream.
sentences.chinese: 餘老夫人醒過來，難解這個希罕的夢。

sentences.english: Of a mysterious or obscure nature.
sentences.chinese: 不可思議的，含糊難解的。

sentences.english: Be the key developer and troubleshooter for our wholesale website.
sentences.chinese: 對我們的批發網站的主要開發商和疑難解答。

sentences.english: At least one political analyst finds the First Lady something of a cipher.
sentences.chinese: 很多分析家認爲第一夫人簡直就是一個難解之謎。

sentences.english: Please try these troubleshooting steps to resolve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 請嘗試這些疑難解答步驟解決問題。

sentences.english: This will give foreigners cause China's "conundrum" impression.
sentences.chinese: 這會給外國人造成中國“難解之謎”的印象。

sentences.english: Marrage is a hard equation to work out.
sentences.chinese: 婚姻是一道難解的方程式。

definition: man of Qǐ fears the sky falling (idiom); groundless fears
(of an illness, debt etc) to plague sb/to preoccupy sb/difficult to get rid of
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
to remain silent/to have nothing to say/(coll.) speechless/dumbfounded
to gather together/to investigate/to entangle/to correct
to spend effort/to take trouble/May I trouble you to...? (as part of polite request)/Please would you mind...?
